::Slaughter::

        Slaughter grumbled in rage as more pods hit him, and more vines
tangled him up.

        "That's it!!!  I...can't....take it.....ANYMORE!  I'M HUNGRY!  I
MUST FEED!" Slaughter yelled.

        Slaughter's rage was put to work, as he started ripping all the
vines with his pincirs, and ate a lot of them.  Finally, he got out of most
them, but there were still some small remains.

        "Not....good....enough.......beginning.....to.....STARVE!" Slaughter
raved on again about his hunger.

    Slaughter lunged forward at Stratus, hoping to tackle him down and at
least get a chomp(with his mouth) on him.  Slaughter was getting hungry, and
he had to feed on a bot soon, or he would be mere millimetres away from
death.
